label: 園城寺伝記
本: Five Mountains: The Rinzai Zen Monastic Institution in Medieval Japan . Harvard University Press . 1981
見出し読み: おんじょうじ でんき
説明文: A temple record in ten volumes that covers the history and legends of Onjoji. Though brief in several cases, it contains some useful information regarding Onjoji's conflicts with Enryakuji.
